articles.description: Simon Thompson seemed to arrive to talk about strikes determined not to answer questions asked
articles.content: There have been worse performers in front of a business select committee, but Simon Thompson, chief executive of Royal Mail, had a shocker on Tuesday. When the session ends with the committee chair t… [+4425 chars]
